name: The very long walk
description:
The very long walk is an endless running game.
Join Scott, Sara, Liam, Dr. Jonas and Bernie on a very long walk and see how far you can get without dying. Can you ever reach their destination to see what lies there? No one knows!

Features:

  • Procedurally generated levels with unique soundtracks and backgrounds
  • 5 playable characters (Scott, Sara, Liam, Dr. Jonas and Bernie)
  • Unlockable hats to customize your characters (free via gameplay)
  • Global leaderboards to compete with your friends and players around the world
  • Holiday events with new content and unlocks
  • Free content and feature updates, no Microtransactions!

Halloween content:

  • 4 new music tracks
  • New permanently unlocked pumpkin hat
  • New spooky main menu
  • New dark night levels with lots of bats

Winter content:

  • 4 new music tracks + new menu music
  • New top hat available for all characters
  • New winter themend main menu
  • New winter level background
